meanings.definition: In a thumping manner; with a thump.
meanings.sent1: The door closed thumpingly behind him.
meanings.sent2: She ran thumpingly towards the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The cat landed thumpingly on the soft cushion.
meanings.sent4: The hammer fell thumpingly on the nail, securing it in place.
meanings.sent5: The thunder rolled thumpingly in the distance, shaking the windows.

meanings.sent2: He was thumpingly excited about the upcoming concert.
meanings.sent3: The news of the snow day was thumpingly welcomed by the students.
meanings.sent4: Her heart beat thumpingly fast as she approached the stage.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks lit up the sky thumpingly, dazzling everyone below.
